Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.services

Interface IPlatformSchedulerProvider

All Superinterfaces:
Provider<IPlatformScheduler>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPlatformSchedulerProvider
public interface IPlatformSchedulerProvider extends Provider<IPlatformScheduler>
Implements a service to provide a platform dependent scheduler of type IPlatformScheduler.

Schedulers depend on the runtime platform, yet they might need some configuration data for initialization. So it is not feasible to use ServiceLoader directly with the scheduler, but an intermediate service class is used. This service class will create a scheduler for the current runtime platform and pass the required configuration data to the constructor.

      IPlatformScheduler get() throws IllegalStateException
      Creates a new platform scheduler or reuses the previously created one.
      Specified by:
      get in interface Provider<IPlatformScheduler>
      Returns:
      A new or reused scheduler or null in case none can be created.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if settings data is required but no data has been set via setSettings(ISettingsModel)
